ygData.subject: Treant Fists
ygData.msgSnippet: Well even though they are just a dex +3 goves.  I ve been camping them anyways.  I have all the components but the humorous handled mace.  I camped it for
ygData.messageBody: Well even though they are just a dex +3 goves. I've been camping them anyways. I have all the components but the humorous handled mace. I camped it for about 9 hours yesterday. Killed every gobbo i came across. Somebody told me that the alchamists is a seven hour spawn, and that the placeholder is a wondering goblin. So first thing you do is wonder through beholder and kill every single goblin you come accross. I logged on at 7:40 MTN and a guy there said he had spawn at around 7:00. Well good hunting to you all, and i hope you put this info to good use.
